lib.utils 源代码

# coding: utf-8
'''
辅助功能函数
'''
import sys



[文档]class Utils(object):


[文档]    def utf8_filter(self,str):
        '''
        UTF8终端打印编码过滤
        :param str:
        :return:
        '''
        if sys.stdout.encoding == 'cp936':
            #sys.stdout = UnicodeStreamFilter(sys.stdout)
            return str
        elif sys.stdout.encoding == 'UTF-8':
            return str.encode('utf-8')
        else:
            return str.encode('utf-8')
